001package org.biopax.validator.api;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
004import org.biopax.validator.api.beans.*;
005import org.w3c.dom.Document;
006
007import javax.xml.bind.JAXBContext;
008import javax.xml.bind.JAXBException;
009import javax.xml.bind.Marshaller;
010import javax.xml.bind.Unmarshaller;
011import javax.xml.transform.*;
012import javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMResult;
013import javax.xml.transform.dom.DOMSource;
014import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamResult;
015import java.io.Writer;
016
017public interface ValidatorUtils {
018
019  static Class[] jaxbContext() {
020    return new Class[]{ValidatorResponse.class, Validation.class, ErrorCaseType.class,
021      ErrorType.class, Behavior.class, Category.class};
022  }
023
024  /**
025   * Creates default error.
026   *
027   * @param objectName name of the problematic model object
028   * @param errorCode validator error code
029   * @param ruleName validation rule name
030   * @param isFixed true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
031   * @param msgArgs error message details
032   * @return error type
033   */
034  static ErrorType error(String objectName, String errorCode,
035                         String ruleName, boolean isFixed, Object... msgArgs)
036  {
037    Behavior behavior = Behavior.ERROR;
038    ErrorType error = new ErrorType(errorCode, behavior);
039    error.setMessage("No description.");
040    String msg = StringUtils.join(msgArgs, "; ");
041    ErrorCaseType errorCase = new ErrorCaseType(ruleName, objectName, msg);
042    errorCase.setFixed(isFixed);
043    error.addErrorCase(errorCase);
044    return error;
045  }
046
047
048  /**
049   * Gets the validation results (xml) marshaller.
050   *
051   * @return jaxb marshaller
052   */
053  static Marshaller getMarshaller() {
054    try {
055      Marshaller marshaller = JAXBContext
056        .newInstance(jaxbContext()).createMarshaller();
057      marshaller.setProperty(Marshaller.JAXB_FORMATTED_OUTPUT, Boolean.TRUE);
058      marshaller.setProperty(Marshaller.JAXB_ENCODING, "UTF-8");
059      return marshaller;
060    } catch (JAXBException e) {
061      throw new RuntimeException("Failed to create Marshaller", e);
062    }
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Gets the validation results (xml) Unmarshaller.
067   *
068   * @return unmarshaller
069   */
070  static Unmarshaller getUnmarshaller() {
071    try {
072      return JAXBContext
073        .newInstance(jaxbContext()).createUnmarshaller();
074    } catch (JAXBException e) {
075      throw new RuntimeException("Failed to create Unmarshaller", e);
076    }
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Writes the multiple results report.
081   * (as transformed XML).
082   *
083   * @param validatorResponse results
084   * @param writer output
085   * @param xslt source
086   */
087  static void write(ValidatorResponse validatorResponse, Writer writer, Source xslt) {
088    try {
089      if (xslt != null) {
090        Document doc = asDocument(validatorResponse);
091        Source xmlSource = new DOMSource(doc);
092        Result result = new StreamResult(writer);
093        TransformerFactory transFact = TransformerFactory.newInstance();
094        Transformer trans = transFact.newTransformer(xslt);
095        trans.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.INDENT, "yes");
096        trans.setOutputProperty("{http://xml.apache.org/xslt}indent-amount", "2");
097        trans.transform(xmlSource, result);
098      } else {
099        // write without any xslt
100        getMarshaller().marshal(validatorResponse, writer);
101      }
102
103    } catch (Exception e) {
104      throw new RuntimeException("Cannot transform/serialize/write: "
105        + validatorResponse, e);
106    }
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Writes the single validation report.
111   * (as transformed XML).
112   *
113   * @param validationResult results
114   * @param writer XML validation result output
115   * @param xslt source
116   */
117  static void write(Validation validationResult, Writer writer, Source xslt) {
118    ValidatorResponse resp = new ValidatorResponse();
119    resp.addValidationResult(validationResult);
120    write(resp, writer, xslt);
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Converts a validator response (contains one or
125   * several validation results) into the document.
126   *
127   * @param validatorResponse results
128   * @return results as XML DOM
129   */
130  static Document asDocument(ValidatorResponse validatorResponse) {
131    DOMResult domResult = marshal(validatorResponse);
132    Document validation = (Document) domResult.getNode();
133    return validation;
134  }
135
136  static DOMResult marshal(Object obj) {
137    DOMResult domResult = new DOMResult();
138    try {
139      getMarshaller().marshal(obj, domResult);
140    } catch (Exception e) {
141      throw new RuntimeException("Cannot serialize object: " + obj, e);
142    }
143    return domResult;
144  }
145
146  /**
147   * Gets current max number of errors to report.
148   *
149   * @return maximal no. errors to be collected (to abort and return the results)
150   */
151  int getMaxErrors();
152
153  /**
154   * Sets current max number of errors to report.
155   *
156   * @param max maximal no. errors to be collected (to abort and return the results)
157   */
158  void setMaxErrors(int max);
159
160  /**
161   * Creates an error type with single error case.
162   *
163   * @param objectName name of the problematic model object
164   * @param errorCode validator error code
165   * @param ruleName validation rule name
166   * @param profile validation profile
167   * @param isFixed true/false - whether it's auto-fixed or not
168   * @param msgArgs error message details
169   * @return error type obj.
170   */
171  ErrorType createError(String objectName, String errorCode,
172                        String ruleName, String profile, boolean isFixed,
173                        Object... msgArgs);
174
175  /**
176   * Gets rule's behavior (mode), to be used
177   * when registering an error case reported by the rule.
178   *
179   * @param ruleName validation rule class name, e.g., org.biopax.validator.rules.MyRule
180   * @param profile  validation profile name or null (default profile)
181   * @return error level
182   * @see Behavior
183   */
184  Behavior getRuleBehavior(String ruleName, String profile);
185
186  /**
187   * @param ruleName validation rule class name, e.g., org.biopax.validator.rules.MyRule
188   * @return rule description
189   */
190  String getRuleDescription(String ruleName);
191
192}
